attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Gordon

Dinnae go radge with Raj.

Please ask the General Medical Council to chastise Raj Persaud but only give him a mild telling off so he can carry on amusing us with his banal pronouncements.

Your leadership is needed on behalf of the large segment of the electorate who relish mediocre mumbo-jumbo. 

We the undersigned don't really approve of plagiarism.  However, Raj Persuad has given hours of endless amusement to dedicated Raj-watchers as we delight in his ability to make lots of money by stating the obvious.  


"Plagiarize, 
Let no one else's work evade your eyes, 
Remember why the good Lord made your eyes, 
So don't shade your eyes, 
But plagiarize, plagiarize, plagiarize... 
Only be sure always to call it please research

Tom Lehrer - Lobachevsky

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
